name: Algorith
description: The Algorith is a formidable medium-sized construct known for its exceptional armor and durability, with physical prowess evident in its high Strength and Constitution scores. It possesses a sleek, mechanical form that suggests both power and intelligence, equipped to deal significant force damage and manipulate spells.
memorable: Its ability to negate spells and its stunning explosion capability make it a unique and challenging opponent.
goals: To dominate in combat and strategically manipulate the battlefield.
relations: It may be encountered alongside other constructs or magical entities that share a similar purpose.
environment: Typically found in places of magic, order, or constructs hidden in labs or clockwork cities.
strengths: Immunity to many conditions and damages, and high durability.
weaknesses: Reliance on physical power, making it vulnerable to certain attack types.
attacks: The Logic Razor is a powerful melee weapon strike, while the Cone of Negation delivers area force damage and dispels magic.
most_powerful_ability: The Reality Bomb can deal significant area damage and stun foes, creating tactical advantages in combat.
senses: The Algorith has darkvision up to 60 feet and a passive perception of 17, enhancing its spatial awareness.
skills: Proficient in Athletics, Insight, Investigation, and Perception, indicating its capabilities in physical feats and awareness.
additional_information: Construct Nature allows it to function without basic needs like air and sleep.
Immutable Form grants immunity to alterations of its physical state.
Can cast a variety of spells to support itself and allies in combat.
Possesses high Charisma, enhancing its spellcasting abilities.
Resilient against many forms of damage, making it a robust opponent.
spellcasting: Casts spells at will, including bless, detect magic, dimension door, and dispel magic, along with commune and wall of force once per day.
